origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'FinanceAPI.get_policy_impact', 'description': 'This function analyzes the impact of financial policies on specific industries based on policy documents and investment data.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'policyType', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The type of financial policy, e.g., infrastructure, trade.'}, {'name': 'industry', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The industry to analyze the impact on, e.g., construction, manufacturing.'}, {'name': 'dataNeeded', 'type': 'LIST', 'description': 'A list of data types required for the analysis, e.g., policyDocuments, investmentData.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'impactAnalysis', 'description': 'The analysis of how the financial policy impacts the specified industry.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 FinanceAPI.get_policy_impact, 它的参数输入如下: 'policyType'是'infrastructure', 'industry'是'construction', 'dataNeeded'是['policyDocuments', 'investmentData'].
